item.title: KTR Predicts By-Election in Gadwal, Urges BRS Leaders to Prepare
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Bharat Rashtra Samithi (BRS) Working President K.T. Rama Rao (KTR) has hinted that a by-election will soon take place in the Gadwal constituency. He urged party leaders to be fully prepared for the upcoming election.
During a meeting at his residence in Hyderabad, KTR made these remarks while interacting with BRS leader Basu Hanumanthu Naidu. Naidu had visited KTR to invite him to his brotherâ€™s wedding when the discussion turned to political developments in Gadwal.
KTR stated that a by...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
